Paragraph.Text: Biomass Growth is found in the Toxic Caverns. There were findings of veins closely to the Toxic Caverns but never in greater distance. It can be Dug-up with a Build Gun MK2, Ore Extractors and by Trencher-Extractors.
Biomass Growth can be used for Plastic Pellet production or for High Energy Composite Fuel.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left:
Occurrence: Ping Color: 1st Stage of Extraction: 2nd Stage of Extraction:
3rd Stage of Extraction:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: Toxic Caverns (-350m to -550m) Light Blue Build Gun MK2 Ore Extractor Fitted with "Steel Cutterhead" or harder. Trencher Extractor MK1-MK3
